Articles.Content:
Updated and released, look forward to seeing the pics, also here's the extra moon

http://i.imgur.com/4Dsb48m.png

It looks like the stone on my ring.

Well, I'm sorry to say I just couldn't get it done... The holes funnel down pretty fast and I hit the walls three times. I'm not that good, maybe someone else will do it.

Anyway, it's a very interesting moon. I got lots of great pictures.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-03-0308-37-59-41.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-03-0308-42-40-44.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-03-0310-35-41-92.jpg

You should consider replacing Dudley with another Peabody type moon. It would make for a more realistic system. Plus Peabody is incredibly interesting and fits the look of Fearless. Having another Peabody type moon would make the system even better.

Edited March 3, 2014 by Larrt_M
make sure to switch to surface rather than orbit. (clicking on the m/s will do it)

Yeah, I was on orbit. I was watching it to match my rotation speed with Peabody...I've only been at this for about a month. My flight skills are not very good yet. In time, in time.... My ship is still there I may give it another go.

I was thinking of putting a rover on Fearless, but if you are going to add an atmosphere I will wait. I have a long list of missions..

Edited March 3, 2014 by Larrt_M
yeah if you click the speed indicator on the top of the navball you can switch between orbit surface and target. Surface basically shows you your velocity in relation to the surface.
might make a moon with atmosphere, giving a third moon to the system. Also may change the size a bit.
Ok final moon for the system is called Brag. Will be creating a new system after this one, probably going to break up the current system into two separate packs as well. Boris and Fearless
Any pictures of Brag yet?
does this work with hyper edit?
first post has one
That looks like a good one!

Very mountainous, trying to reduce the memory impact of the mod right now, then I'll release

Next release will be a two part system, boris and fearless

I.E. two separate downloads

Medikohl, If you are making a Gas Giant, I would be happy to suggest some ideas! (Yes, I might have segguested this on Sido's system too, but it doesn't matter! Right?)

Gas planet named: Lavendarous

Picture:

Information: It is actually not stormy at all! And it's polls are on its side along with rings going from equator to equator! This fun purple planet loves to get its hands dirty!

Spec.: Sideways rings, Sideways polls, Sideways Equator!

Orbits: Sun or Kerbol

Moon named: Carter

Picture:

+Map:

Information: This planet is a cratered planet with oceans in the craters and this planet also is call "dead" Because of it's low gravity (Duna gravity) And lack of water...

Specs.: Dead, Duna Grav, Cratered water, Lack of water, Mountain-y

Orbits: Lavendarous

Moon named: Desta

Picture:

+Map:

Information: This little planet is made of rocks, more rocks, And rocks! Isn't that just exciting?!

Specs.: Giant crater

Orbits: Carter

Moon named: Multo

Picture:

Information: This planet is purple. Maybe it is a sister to Eve in a way! Who knows, Maybe this should be my new baby crib! Not saying I'm a baby!

Specs.: Icy, Purple, little craters, Thick atmosphere

Orbits: Lavendarous

I love these ideas and hope you make a gas giant, With some of these moons orbiting it! Plus, Please add more moons, I didn't wan't to make this message too long, I love your work, Medikohl, Hope life is good!

Edited March 5, 2014 by uxuser
Links or pictures were broken...

uxuser. you kind of messed up the links, can't see any of them

Also, can't change Axial tilts with how the engine is set up.

Edited March 5, 2014 by medikohl

Fixing them!

Sorry about that pal!

None of those picture links are working....

Edited March 5, 2014 by Larrt_M
Looks Neat!.

Update uploading.

Packaged each system separately
It's updated

There is something odd going on with the texture of Bullwinkle. It's got a big zigzag seem running all the way up and down one side of it.. It's very noticeable and I never noticed that on an earlier version. I haven't landed on Bullwinkle yet so can't say for sure it's not on earlier versions.
It's just the height map not quite lining up, Still working on a way to fix the issue. Just about every planet has that to some degree
Fearless has an atmosphere now, very thin, and challenging.

So as you get closer the zigzag seem will disappear? If you could adjust the viewing distance that would probably fix it. It's not a big deal if it is OK when you get closer anyway.

You are going to create one more system?

Edited March 6, 2014 by Larrt_M

Fearless has an atmosphere now, very thin, and challenging.

Yes I noticed, you should think about adding some fine clouds...

Edited March 6, 2014 by Larrt_M

Post 100! (like it matters)

Might go the cloud route, but I'm trying to keep the RAM impact low for more planets
